sentence.Network_en: He explained, good - naturedly, across the little gap of years that separated them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他越过把他们分开的年龄间隔的代沟, 和善地加以解释.

sentence.Network_en: He could laugh good - naturedly, a little smugly , at whatever was conspicuous.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看到任何标新立异的事, 总会一笑置之, 并无恶意.

sentence.Network_en: She smiled at Carrie good - naturedly as she passed, showing pretty, even teeth, and Carrie smiled back.
sentence.Network_cn: 她走过时善意地对嘉莉笑了笑, 露出漂亮 、 整齐的牙齿, 嘉莉也对她笑了笑.

PerfectNetExp.abs: as he came into the hall he encountered the girl , who was now looking after another chamber . she had on a white dusting cap , beneath which her chubby face shone good-naturedly .走到门厅时，又碰到了那个姑娘。她正在打扫另一个房间，头上戴着一项白色的掸尘帽子，帽子下胖乎乎的脸蛋露出和善的笑意。

auth_sentence.content: Several species being replaced by one is never good.
auth_sentence.res_content: Several species being replaced by one is never good.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Several species being replaced by one is never good.

auth_sentence.content: Think your posts have been rather good, BTW.
auth_sentence.res_content: Think your posts have been rather good, BTW.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Think your posts have been rather good, BTW.

auth_sentence.content: I've got a really good feeling about it.
auth_sentence.res_content: I've got a really good feeling about it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I've got a really good feeling about it.
